snippet: A military investigator recommended that four more soldiers be court-martialed in connection with the death of Pvt. Danny Chen, but said the most serious charge against them, involuntary manslaughter, should be dropped
abstract: A military investigator recommended that four more soldiers be court-martialed in connection with the death of Pvt. Danny Chen, but said the most serious charge against them, involuntary manslaughter, should be dropped

headline.main: Army Recommends Court-Martialing 4 Soldiers in Death of Private
